name: Insecurity of Things
tagline: You bought it we break it
body:
### Welcome to Insecurity of Things
Creating POC for IoT devices to promote increase IoT security. Often it is necessary to demonstrate risk in order to create action. Unfortunately, these kinds of issues don't show up on Nessus scans, so we write exploits. Please use this code responsibly.

## Projects ##

[JackIt](https://github.com/insecurityofthings/jackit) -- MouseJack POC

## Who ##
We work in the security industry and often it is necessary to demonstrate risk in order to create action. These implementations where written by [phikshun](https://github.com/phikshun) and [infamy](https://github.com/infamy).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
